titleStmt.title: The trumpet of vvarre A sermon preached at Paules Crosse the seuenth of Maie 1598. By M. Steph. Gosson parson of great Wigborow in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Gosson, Stephen, 1554-1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: By V. S[immes] for I. O[xenbridge] dwelling in Paules churchyard at the signe of the parot,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Paules churchyard at the signe of the parot
